standardized english testing is all over the fking place like the UK and commonwealth countries use IELTS  which is run by British Council
when I did my IELTS I saw a lot of white kids who clearly did their entire education in singapore but because singapore is in china or whatever  they have to prove that they can speak english

when I applied for australia  they accepted my A Levels as proof that I can speak english and I think they generally accepted proof that your education was conducted mostly in english
i did chat with the person giving me my speaking test  and even she agreed it's pretty dumb that singaporeans need to take it
